description: This table stores data for all of a patient's pre-ordered specimens.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_PREORD_COLLECT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether or not related specimen orders were collected.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Collected


Not Collected


No Status Documented

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_PREORD_NC
columns.description: Stores comments for specimen pre-orders that have been documented as "Not Collected" in EPT 88401.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_PREORD_IB_MSG_ID
columns.description: Stores the In Basket message ID for required pre-order specimens that has not been collected.
